fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Eat your lasagna, gaining Overprotective defense and immunity to negative effects. (1 use)
- Watch what's on the TV, learning a role in the game and 2 players that could have it. (1 use)
- Reset the clock to avoid that pesky monday, instantly skipping the night without processing any actions. (1 use)
- Kick a player, attacking them. You may also aim a player to kick them at, redirecting your kick victim to that player. (1 use)
- Loot the fridge of another player for any food, disabling their attributes. (1 use)
- Rest in the roof of another player's house, gaining a private night chat with them. (1 use)
- During the day, talk with the rats? i think one was named Nermal? goofy ass name, but anyways, learn the contents of a random whisper today at the end of the day. (1 use)
- Blame one of your bad actions on another player, when they are executed, gain 1 ammo for an ability of your choice. Can be multitasked. (1 use)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If you visit or are visited by a dog role, you are forced to kick them if you have ammo.
- Wolves count as dogs they're just big dangerous dogs.
- All of the latex roles also count as dogs garfield hates furries.
- You're roleblocked on irl mondays you lazy cat. >:(
